section.title: System Device Directory Ownership
section.para:
Controls access to key system device directories. System device directories under /dev should be owned by root and group root. This module ensures that these subdirectories have root set as the owner and group.
/dev
Files and Directories /dev
It is recommended to apply this module. In most cases, the permissions set by this module are operating system defaults; therefore, applying this module should not impact normal operations.

listitem.para: CC-3 - Secure Configurations for Hardware and Software on Laptops, Workstations, and Servers
GEN002280 - Device files and directories must only be writable by users with a system account or as configured by the vendor.
